original_title: 猫侍 南の島へ行く
overview: The Edo period.  Once a famous swordsman, Kyutaro Madarame, aka “Madara the Devil,” is now a masterless samurai.  When a white cat called Tamanojo appears before Kyutaro, the encounter changes him forever.  Starring Kazuki Kitamura.  This offbeat tale of samurai spirit and adorable animal antics returns to the screen on a breathtaking scale!
title: Samurai Cat 2: A Tropical Adventure
